verbs.description: [ARG0: ryan] [V: throws] [ARGM-MNR: for 379 yards falcons] beat [ARG1: giants] matt ryan threw a 47-yard touchdown pass to marvin hall tevin coleman broke loose on a 30-yard scoring run and the atlanta falcons added another chapter to new york miserable season beating the giants 23 - 20 on monday night ryan completed his final 18 passes and finished 31 of 39 for 379 yards sending the giants 1 - 6 to their fourth straight loss giorgio tavecchio filling in for injured atlanta kicker matt bryant sealed the victory for atlanta 3 - 4 with the longest field goal of his career from 56 yards facing one of the nfl worst defenses new york botched its best scoring chance by going for a touchdown on fourth - and - goal from the 1 early in the third quarter scott simonson sterling shepard twitter washington matt bryant matt ryan giants band falcons ryan spotted hall new york saquon barkley odell beckham marvin hall giants pat shurmur andy levitre atlanta falcons brandon fusco atlanta giorgio tavecchio eli manning paul newberry nfl national football league ryan tevin coleman
